text:
@NikkiHaley @standamericanow You support an Impeached man who has Putin  steal the 2016 election for him 

Sexually  assaults women 

Let’s Putin put bounties onthe heads of our troops 

Is crashing the economy, and killing Americans with Covid-19

Your worried about someone else standing up to someone
